track.name: Duel of the Iron Mic
comments: ODB using his vocals to perfection.
This has everything perfect beat  the GZA at his best and even ODB for the chorus
first time hearing this i thot "wtf" at the opening verse.. like i shoulda jizzed but didnt have a boner at the time. totally caught me by surprise

first verse could be the best rap verse, period. [2]
One of my fav hip hop songs ever
the bit when the beat goes back to the first loop after "keys in their vaginas" is just amazing
Submit with honor to a duel, with my son.

definitely the best WU album ever..."Just one of those songs that you know is a classic after hearing the first line."
"I Agree"
Props to RZA for one the tighest beats ever.
One of the illest tracks ever made.
perfect hip-hop. this whole album is on another level
So bad that ODB is just here to shout "Duel of the Iron Mic" three times through the song.
